name: Commander Shepard
info:
• 简体中文名: 薛帕德指挥官
  • 别名: 薛帕德少校
  • 别名: Lieutenant Commander shepard
  • 别名: 斜坡
  • 性别: 男/女
  • 生日: 2154年4月11日
detail: Shepard was born on April 11, 2154, is a graduate of the Systems Alliance N7 special forces program (service no. 5923-AC-2826), a veteran of the Skyllian Blitz, and is initially assigned to the SSV Normandy in 2183 as Executive Officer. Shepard later becomes the first human to join the Spectres, an elite special task force for the Citadel Council.
